name: Corvux.me
desc: This website! This is a big testing ground as I learn more about python, and various aspects of programming that I don't get to explore in my normal job. Corvux has been my username for years, so this domain made sense.

name: TheBrokenProphecy.com
desc: Website for the Broken Prophecy D&D 5e server and ProphetBot. Allows login via Discord, displays information to players, and various configuration pages for server administrators depending on their role on the Discord server.

name: Avrae Combat Planner
desc: GUI tool to help plan combat in Avrae and On the Fly Battlemaps (OTFBM)

name: SW5E Weapon Calculator
desc: Web bassed calculator to get away from a GSheet calculator. Allows for more flexibility, and sharing

name: ProphetBot
desc: Discord bot for Broken Prophecy D&D 5e Server. Logs player transactions and tracks player xp/gold progress. Helps facilitate mini-campaigns, player managed channels, shops, and server moderation.

name: G0-T0 Resolute
desc: Similar to ProphetBot, this bot has been tweaked, and altered to work within the Star Wars 5E ruleset using their currencies, and helping track characters, ships, classes, and everything unique to this system.

name: SW5E Things
desc: Avrae collection of Aliases and Snippets to help facilitate playing Star Wars 5E with Avrae bot in Discord, from class features, powers (spells), and monsters.

name: Avrae-Pycharm
desc: Small python utility to help with Avrae management in Pycarm
